title: Free Therapy
description: First we help re-build their lost confidence in themselves. We have partnered with mental health professionals to help kids from difficult backgrounds navigate around their difficulties and towards their dreams. We will never charge for this service.

title: Interview Coaching
description: Do you want to be a Software Engineer/AI Engineer/Product Manager? Do you want to work at Meta, Apple, Amazon, Netflix, Google? Sign up for free interview coaching with engineers who work here.
